gw.api.validation

Class ValidationIssue

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.validation.ValidationIssue
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FieldValidation, GeneralValidation

    public class ValidationIssue
extends Object
    ValidationIssue wraps a validation message (the Reason property) along with its validation level and type (Error or Warning), and other data. It is created by calls to a reject...() method on a Validatable bean.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      EntityValidation EntityValidation
      Corresponding EntityValidation, if any.
      String FlowStepId
      The identifier of the flow step, such as a WizardStep page, where this ValidationIssue should be displayed to the user. Not currently used.
      ValidationLevel Level
      ValidationLevel to which the reason message applies.
      String Reason
      The validation message.
      Key RelatedBeanID
      A sub-entity of the bean being validated, to which this issue is tied.
      ValidationIssue SupersedingIssue
      ValidationIssueType Type
      The type of issue, generally Error or Warning.
